sentences.en: a delicate/pale/rich/soft shade of red
sentences.cn: 淡 / 浅 / 艳 / 柔和的红色

sentences.en: a plant that needs a lot of shade
sentences.cn: 喜阴植物

sentences.en: colleges were conducting campaigns to ban Jewish societies—shades of Nazi Germany.
sentences.cn: 许多大学正在发起运动，取缔犹太社团——使人联想起纳粹德国。

sentences.en: Dr Sinclair's affirmative nod seemed a shade reluctant.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱博士虽然点头表示了同意，但还显得有点不情愿。

sentences.en: he was a shade hung-over.
sentences.cn: 他有点醉后头晕。

sentences.en: His writing benefits from the shade of Lincoln hovering over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他的写作得益于他感到已故的林肯一直在他身后激励着他。

sentences.en: I keep cool by staying in the shade and not moving much.
sentences.cn: 由于我待在树阴下,不多走动,所以还不热.

sentences.en: In the mornings the sky appeared a heavy shade of mottled gray.
sentences.cn: 清晨，天空呈现出斑驳的深灰色。

sentences.en: Shading her eyes, Anita scanned the horizon.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔手搭凉棚，眺望地平线。

sentences.en: She raised her hand to shade her eyes from the sun.
sentences.cn: 她抬起手遮住眼睛上方以挡住阳光.

sentences.en: She was sitting in the shade of a large oak tree.
sentences.cn: 她坐在一棵大橡树的树荫下。

sentences.en: She was wearing an unbecoming shade of purple.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身不相配的紫色衣服。

sentences.en: strong contrasts of light and shade
sentences.cn: 明暗的强烈对比

sentences.en: The first two goals were a shade fortunate.
sentences.cn: 头两个进球都有点碰巧。

sentences.en: The only shade was under the body of the plane.
sentences.cn: 唯一的阴凉处是飞机机身下面。

sentences.en: The paint can be diluted with water to make a lighter shade.
sentences.cn: 这颜料可用水稀释以使色度淡一些。

sentences.en: The room was painted in an unappealing shade of brown.
sentences.cn: 这屋子漆成了难看的棕色。

sentences.en: The shade on the lamp was slightly crooked.
sentences.cn: 灯罩稍有些歪。

sentences.en: The temperature soared to above 100 degrees in the shade.
sentences.cn: 阴凉处的温度骤升至100多度。

sentences.en: They lay down under the shade of a tree.
sentences.cn: 他们躺在一棵树的树阴下.

sentences.en: This artist uses light and shade to good effect.
sentences.cn: 这位艺术家很会运用明暗效果.

sentences.en: Umbrellas shade outdoor cafes along winding cobblestone streets.
sentences.cn: 在曲折蜿蜒的鹅卵石街道的两边，一把把阳伞为露天咖啡馆遮阴挡阳。

sentences.en: We sat down in the shade of the wall.
sentences.cn: 我们在墙根的背阴处坐下。

sentences.en: You can't look directly into it; you've got to shade your eyes or close them altogether.
sentences.cn: 你不能直视它；你得遮住双眼或者完全闭上眼睛。

words.tran_cn: 朦胧的；有阴影的；虚无的；暗黑的
成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的
暧昧；隐蔽；有阴影的情形
底纹；遮蔽；[印刷] 明暗法；[印刷] 描影法；留下阴影
遮蔽住；使阴暗（shade的过去分词）
遮蔽（shadow的过去式及过去分词）
使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖

phrases.tran_cn: 使人联想起；使人与……相比

trans.tran_cn: 阴凉处，背阴，色度，灯罩，（绘画）阴影部分，差别，略微，痕迹，影子，墨镜，窗帘，幽灵
trans.tran_en: the dark places in a picture

trans.tran_cn: 给…遮挡（光线），加灯罩，把…涂暗，逐渐变成
trans.tran_en: to protect something from direct light

trans.tran_cn: 遮蔽， 遮光； 把…涂暗
trans.tran_en: to protect something from direct light
